# Support

## How to Get Help

Thank you for using BusinessPlus Test Environment Refresh! Here are the best ways to get help:

### üìñ Documentation

Start with our documentation:
- [README](../README.md) - Installation and usage instructions
- [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- [CHANGELOG](../CHANGELOG.md) - Recent changes and updates

### ‚ùì Questions and Discussions

- **GitHub Discussions**: Use [Discussions](https://github.com/businessplus-community/bp-test-env-refresh/discussions) for:
  - General questions about usage
  - Best practices and tips
  - Feature ideas and feedback
  - Connecting with other users

### üêõ Bug Reports

- **GitHub Issues**: [Report bugs](https://github.com/businessplus-community/bp-test-env-refresh/issues/new?template=bug_report.md) with:
  - Clear description of the problem
  - Steps to reproduce
  - Error messages and logs
  - Environment details

### üí° Feature Requests

- **GitHub Issues**: [Request features](https://github.com/businessplus-community/bp-test-env-refresh/issues/new?template=feature_request.md) with:
  - Clear description of the feature
  - Use cases and benefits
  - Any implementation ideas

### üîí Security Issues

- **DO NOT** open public issues for security vulnerabilities
- Email security concerns to: code@bpluscommunity.org
- See our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md) for details

### üìß Direct Contact

For matters that don't fit the above categories:
- Email: code@bpluscommunity.org
- Website: [bpluscommunity.org](https://bpluscommunity.org)

### ü§ù Community Guidelines

When seeking support, please:
- Search existing issues and discussions first
- Provide detailed information about your problem
- Be respectful and patient
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

## Response Times

We're a volunteer community, so response times may vary:
- **Critical security issues**: Within 48 hours
- **Bug reports**: Within 1 week
- **Feature requests**: Reviewed monthly
- **General questions**: Community-driven

## Contributing Back

The best way to ensure this project continues to improve is to contribute:
- Answer questions in Discussions
- Submit pull requests for fixes
- Share your experiences and solutions
- Help improve documentation

Thank you for being part of the BusinessPlus Community!
